ai-tika-vin11t26:7_1: Herein, this is the right way:
ai-tika-vin11t26:7_2: He should not give the full ordination; he should not have a novice monk attend on a regular monk; he should not accept a regular monk; he should not consent to a regular monk to a regular monk to initiate him; he should not consent to a regular monk to a regular monk to accuse him of an offense; he should not accept a regular monk of an offense; he should not accept a regular monk of an offense; he should not consent to a regular monk offering him a seat when bathing.
